short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: AIPRM is your cheat code for Claude. Adds a list of curated prompt templates and advanced features. Try today.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Get the Most Out of Claude with AIPRM

Are you tired of wasting time and effort trying to get the most out of Claude? AIPRM is here to help.

With AIPRM, you get access to a library of 4500+ professional 1-Click Prompts for Claude. Whether you need help with:

🟢 Generating blog titles for the month
🟢 Writing comprehensive SEO articles
🟢 Crafting professional email responses
🟢 Closing sales leads

AIPRM has a prompt for that.

Join the Ranks of 2 Million+ Users

AIPRM is the most comprehensive Prompt Management system available. With AIPRM, you can:

- Generate valuable content in seconds
- Build your own prompt library for marketing, sales, copywriting, SEO, productivity, customer support, and more
- Share your curated prompt lists with your team for consistent output

Free Features

👫🏿 Teams: Share your prompts with your team and get consistent output

🥸 Custom Profiles: Save time with custom profiles that insert your company's personalized information into Claude output

🔎 Advanced Prompt Search: Find the exact prompts you need with filters like topic, activity, usage, popularity, and open search

🔬 Prompt Variables: Design your own custom prompts with variables for a wider range of use cases

👀 AIPRM Everywhere: Inject research from the internet directly into AIPRM and Claude

🦾 Community Support: Get free access to our community forum with support from expert Prompt Engineers and AIPRM employees

📦 Omnibox: Type CLAUDE and your prompt into your browser's search bar and save time

Premium Features

📝 Custom Tones and Writing Styles: Design your own brand voice and apply it to every prompt

🕸 Live Crawling: Build prompts that crawl specific URLs for targeted online research

📒📒 Prompt Forking: Clone public prompts and reinvent them for your needs

⚡️ Power Continue: Get one-click continuations when Claude stops generating content

✅ Verified Prompts: Get prompts reviewed by expert Prompt Engineers and cleared for Quality Assurance

—

Get Started with AIPRM

This extension requires an AIPRM Account. Learn more at https://www.aiprm.com.

Tutorials and Guides

- How to install the AIPRM extension: https://www.aiprm.com/tutorials/quick-start-guide/how-to-install-the-aiprm-chrome-extension/

- Getting started with AIPRM: https://www.aiprm.com/tutorials/quick-start-guide/getting-started-with-aiprm/

- How to select and use prompts: https://www.aiprm.com/tutorials/get-the-basics/how-to-use-a-prompt/

- How to create a prompt: https://www.aiprm.com/tutorials/create-prompts/how-to-create-a-prompt/

- How to create a team: https://www.aiprm.com/tutorials/get-the-basics/how-to-create-a-team/

More Resources

- AIPRM YouTube Channel: https://www.youtube.com/@aiprm
- AIPRM Tutorials: https://www.aiprm.com/tutorials/

Important Note: Please note that it is AIPRM, not AIRPRM or AIRPM, as some people type in. AIPRM is designed to work exclusively with Claude. Please uninstall other Claude extensions for reliable AIPRM functionality.
